title: Rorie's Inactivity
content:
hello everyone
i know i haven't been active on this board as much as i used, members have left over the years, plus with chirstmas holiday coming up (starts 22/12/06) so i don't know if i will come back will have to wait & see, the board that's been taking me away from the pckf is a site called mylot they even pay you for posting (it's not a scam they really do pay you) see the image below to see proof

[img]http://i11.photobucket.com/albums/a199/rorie1983/mylot.gif[/img]

as you can see in the image i've have already earnt US$11.09
once you have reached the minimum US$10 you can request payout by paypal

anyone interested in making some money[url=http://www.mylot.com/?ref=rorie1983]click here[/url]

they really do pay so please don't lock this topic

if i don't see in the new year, it's been nice being part of the commander keen community during the years

merry xmas
rorieRorie
